name: Noir-GG-p Agent 4
author: Noir-GG-p
description: A specialized agent for batch processing, file management, and scheduled task execution in Nebulai AgentSpace.
documentation: Noir-GG-p Agent 4 is designed to manage scheduled tasks, backups, and batch processing with high error tolerance and strong file management capabilities.
limitations: Not optimized for real-time tasks. Batch size is limited by memory constraints.
futureImprovements: Add support for real-time task scheduling.
